caption.p: Example of chromatogram XIC obtained for a sample of extract of salvia harvest 1 drying naturally. The chromatogram was obtained for the maximum absorbing wavelength at each time point. (1) catechin C 13 (IS) ( m/ z = 291.4/291.4); (2) hesperidin ( m/ z = 300.7/163.8); (3) quercethin ( m/ z = 301.03/178.9); (4) isorhamnetin ( m/ z = 314/300).
